page.title: 20The Domesday Project
page.content: Throughout the months of June and July 1985 the 4th.year children of St.Illtyd's Junior School,Llantwit Major were involved in the Domesday Project. The children,with their teachers, visited the area to be studied on numerous occasions and investigated the land cover and all the amenities contained in the area.They also had to take photographs of the area,and choose 4 which best represented the land cover. The contributors were Alison Williams, Sarah Edwards,Lisa Reilly,Laura-Sian Garvie,Rachel Cheshire,Kerryanne Green,Sarah Browne,Susan Escott,Daniel Skelton,Nicholas Squance,Paul and Matthew Mazzitelli,Emma Fry,Heather Williams,Anthony Farman,Donna Reed,Claire Jenkins and Lorna Payne.
